14331111.title: After school...

143311111.content:
Unaware to you, at lunch that day a schoolgirl went to the restroom in the stall next to you. There, Naomi soon became the toilet itself to keep an eye on you. Once the school day ended and everyone left, she turned back sitting on the toilet. "Hey there," Naomi grinned to her waste."Must be fun there, what you always wanted huh?" She flicked the toilet handle, teasing the flush.

What does she do?
143311111.title: Yes

1433111112.content:
"Maybe I'll leave you in there a while longer." A room was constructed around the stall.The stall was now as though never existed. She smiled as you were now in a toilet in a room no one could access. "I'll see you tomorrow at lunch." She teased before turning into a gaseous state. You remained a mass floating there, now at Naomi's mercy.

What next?
1433111112.title: Leaves you there longer

1433112.content: She'll change you back, but make you her...
1433112.title: Change, but...

14333.content: Does he become the plunger?
14333.title: Other Still

choices: Yes accept a job as clothing in a store
144.content:
You thought better of it.

While at home you get a letter from a company that sold woman's clothing.

Dear sir,
It has come to our attention that you have abilities that might be useful to our company. We already hire people with similar qualities for accepting change. If you are interested we have openings available.
Management at Jennifer's.

Ps. All display and demo merchandise is returned in place of stock from the backroom.

Do you accept the job offer?
144.title: Something else... Like Hogwarts but clothing

info.brief_description: You recieve a letter telling you that you can transform into girly objects at will
info.description:
This is a story about Daniel Who is sent a letter in the post which tells him he can transform into anything that women a woman can use or is currently using. He can also become a maniquen and female body parts as part of his powers.

Characters

Daniel-15, wears glasses, brown hair, enjoys playing games consoles, small for a boy his age, Is currently doing GCSEs
Lucy- 19 can drive and has passed her driving test, long straight blond hair and is slightly smaller than Daniel. She always wears extremely short skirts and tights with 5" high heels. She also does Ballet
Leanne- 14, Long straight blond hair but does wear extensions, wears everything her sister does as she looks up to her and does ballet and swimming and also does acting.
Rebecca-16 long straight brown hair which is put back in a pony tail. She is the same size as Daniel and Daniel has always had a crush on her.

Other characters can be added when and if you want to

Rules

1. No swearing
2. No endings
3. No forced one way continues
4. Certain other people can also transform into other things not neceseraly girly objects, they can see other transformed people when they are transformed
5. You can become things which are already there, you can however also become things which aren't but when you transform back it won't be there
6. When transformed everyone (except those people who can also transform) forgets about you
7. When you transform back you will be in the same possition you would have been in e.g if you were panties you would be wrapped around waist but the panties would still be there if you went into them but if they weren't there originally they wouldn't be
8. You can communicate to other transformers by telepathy while you are transformed if they are near you.
9. When you transform into a mannequin there will be nothing on you but you will be a female mannequin.
10. If you tell anyone (other than other transformers) about your powers they won't believe you
11. If you are worn avoid transforming back until you are taken off unless you have a good explination for the person.
12. There is no time limit to how long he can stay transformed by so he could transform for years and decide to stay there. But remember change him back eventually to continue the story.

Other than that make additions and enjoy the story and make it the best it can be ok

GP for good additions which will be sent to on site email
